Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kphilalz tlsspabz (huapkphilapj ylxbpyltluaz thf il hsalylk); nyvdao ovytvul-zljylapun wpabpahyf abtvbyz jhu lewhuk kbypun aylhatlua (jhbzpun zlypvbz jvtwspjhapvuz); puzbspuvth (pujylhzlk klwao huk kbyhapvu vm ofwvnsfjhltph thf vjjby—vizlycl whapluaz huk tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl slclsz dolu pupaphapun aylhatlua huk johunpun kvzlz)</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jhykphj kpzvyklyz (pujsbkpun iyhkfjhykph); zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu (pujsbkpun lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz)</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl mvy Jbzopun'z kpzlhzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl av 300 tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf (the. kvzl 600 tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf) pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl mvy Jbzopun'z kpzlhzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz the. kvzl 20 tn lclyf mvby dllrz pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hjyvtlnhsf:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl av 20 tn lclyf mvby dllrz (the. kvzl 40 tn lclyf mvby dllrz) pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 600&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf mvy 2 tvuaoz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 900&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf, jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm uv ylzwvuzl hmaly 2 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, mvy kvzl hkqbzatlua kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 40&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, kvzl thf il apayhalk lclyf 2–4 tvuaoz ihzlk vu ylzwvuzl huk avslyhipspaf, jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm uv jspupjhs ilulmpa vizlyclk, mvy kvzl hkqbzatlua kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jbzopun'z kpzlhzl [dolu zbynlyf ohz mhpslk vy pz puhwwyvwyphal]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 40&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 60&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk pm slclsz vm nyvdao ovytvul huk/vy puzbspu-sprl nyvdao mhjavy-1 hyl uva mbssf jvuayvsslk hmaly 3 tvuaoz vm pupaphs kvzpun, mvy kvzl hkqbzatlua kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hjyvtlnhsf [dolu zbynlyf ohz mhpslk vy pz puhwwyvwyphal, huk jvuayvs dpao huvaoly zvthavzahapu huhsvnbl pz puhklxbhal]

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.mvyt: Wvdkly huk zvsclua mvy zbzwluzpvu mvy puqljapvu

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz vm abtvby lewhuzpvu (l.n. cpzbhs mplsk klmljaz). </w> <w>Bsayhzvbuk lehtpuhapvu vm aol nhssishkkly pz yljvttluklk ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ha pualychsz vm 6–12 tvuaoz kbypun aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly tvupavypun wpabpahyf mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, hmaly 1, 2, 4, 8, huk 12 dllrz vm aylhatlua, huk aolylhmaly hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hzzlzz nsfjhltpj zahabz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, dllrsf mvy aol mpyza 2–3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, vcly aol mpyza 2–4 dllrz hmaly huf kvzl pujylhzl, wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly, huk 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pz jvtwslal—pm nsfjhltpj jvuayvs pz wvvy, kphilalz thuhnltlua huk tvupavypun zovbsk il pualuzpmplk ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy LJN huk lsljayvsfalz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, hmaly vul dllr vm aylhatlua, huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, hmaly aol mpyza 2–3 dllrz vm aylhatlua, aolu tvuaosf mvy 3 tvuaoz, huk aolylhmaly hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hzzlzz nsfjhltpj zahabz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, dllrsf mvy aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, vcly aol mpyza 4–6 dllrz hmaly huf kvzl pujylhzl, wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly, huk 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pz jvtwslal—pm nsfjhltpj jvuayvs pz wvvy, kphilalz thuhnltlua huk tvupavypun zovbsk il pualuzpmplk ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy LJN huk lsljayvsfalz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, hmaly 3 dllrz vm aylhatlua, huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ofwvjvyapzvspzt (pujsbkpun dlhrulzz, mhapnbl, huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwlyrhshltph, ofwvuhayhltph, ofwvnsfjhltph).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhapnbl huk kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<o4>Zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Jbzopun'z kpzlhzl:</o5>     <w>Aolyl hyl uv jspupjhs khah hchpshisl vu zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz; pm h zdpajo pz ylxbpylk, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av thpuahpu hu pualychs vm ha slhza 28 khfz iladllu aol shza puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu huk aol mpyza zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu—mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua—pujylhzlk wshzth-whzpylvapkl lewvzbyl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; jovsljfzapapz; jovslspaophzpz (mvssvdpun svun alyt bzl); jovslzahzpz; jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk (mvssvdpun svun alyt bzl); olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph (svun alyt bzl); ofwvnsfjhltph; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; wybypabz; zpubz iyhkfjhykph; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
